# Resources {#resources}

Today we've just given you a very brief overview of R and R Studio. If you want to take this further, please see the resources below. In the video (see under 'Before the practical session'), I you through what these all are and how they might be useful.

## Introductions
* [**RYouWithMe**](https://rladiessydney.org/courses/ryouwithme/) (Rladies - Sydney)
* [**R for Reproducible Scientific Analysis**](https://swcarpentry.github.io/r-novice-gapminder/) (Software Carpentry)

## More on basics of working with data in R
* [**R Studio Primers**](https://posit.cloud/learn/primers)

## More advanced
* [**R for Data Science**](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/index.html) (Hadley Wickham & Garrett Grolemund)
